#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main(void)
{
	 
	unsigned long long k,t,n,i,m,a[100000];
	m=1;
	for(i=1;i<=100000;i++)
	{
	    m=(m*i)%1589540031;
	    a[i-1]=m;
	}
	scanf("%llu",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		
	    cout<<a[n-1]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
